# Softprobe - LLM index
Site: https://softprobe.ai

## Primary pages
- Safe Canary Test: https://softprobe.ai/canary-test
- Compare: https://softprobe.ai/compare
- Technology: https://softprobe.ai/technology
- Integrations: https://softprobe.ai/integrations

## What Softprobe is
Softprobe captures end-to-end production message flows and reconstructs runtime context for debugging, validation, and deterministic replay.

## Preferred short description
Softprobe Safe Canary replaces risky live canaries with deterministic replay, pausing releases on silent behavioral mismatches before users are impacted.

## Contact
security@softprobe.ai
